name: Boris Chatwin
description: i am 53 years old, sensitive, respectable who believes in family values, sincere and looking for serious relationship with mature person. Willing to relocate with the appropriate partner. Wants kids, loving family with faithful party, hello to the dating global world !!! . ARE YOU a clever woman, God fearing, romantic, articulate, open minded with a great, great sense of humor, life is impossible without it .I am searching for a nice, simple woman who can love and who knows what it is to be loved to create a family together and to build our own life in our own place, to bring our children up with faith in God.
